item.title: Missing country map files on FTP server
item.description:
From f3lisca...@gmail.com on June 01, 2012 19:10:24
Related: Issue 127 ( https://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=127 )
There are still version 0.3.0 map files for some European countries missing on the ftp server. On first glance I found Denmark and Belgium missing. There might be more. I guess this is not high priority, but as developers are starting to transition away from 0.2.4 it would be nice to have them all.
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=320

item.contents:
From dassrock...@gmail.com on June 03, 2012 05:35:16
Furthermore Albania, Bulgaria, Croatia, Estonia, Latvia and the french parts are missing.

From infim...@gmail.com on July 27, 2012 01:05:07
And some maps are down: greece.map 26-Jul-2012 17:43 0 hungary.map 26-Jul-2012 18:10 0 iceland.map 26-Jul-2012 18:24 0 ireland.map 26-Jul-2012 18:39 0 isle_of_man.map 26-Jul-2012 18:53 0

From bigchips...@gmail.com on September 02, 2012 12:22:05
the state of Maryland is missing from North America / United States .. it would be greatly appreciated if someone would add it...

From jjbross@gmail.com on October 11, 2012 10:48:45
French map will be generated and made available soon

From jjbross@gmail.com on October 12, 2012 11:00:37
@phols
please provide a simple clip polygon for Thailand and/or Bangkok in the format as described at http://download.geofabrik.de/clipbounds/README
Labels: -Type-Defect Type-Task

From spe...@gmail.com on October 14, 2012 10:00:43
Thank you so much for Madeira map!

From hansgeor...@gmail.com on January 09, 2014 04:59:06
single map of France is still lost

From LudwigBr...@gmail.com on June 19, 2014 07:35:10
I have added Thailand, unfortunately the cloudmade seem to have pivoted and do not do OSM related stuff any more, so the links to their download servers are outdated.
To add other regions I need a polygon file and a start point (which should be the center of the capital or the region)
Thailand should appear with next rendering at start of month.
Status: Started

I pushed some changes on map-creator repository:
Rename back France centre to its OSM default. Move France 'outside Europe regions' to inherit from planet osm. I tried to make them build inside the europe/france folder. Ludwig will this work? Update the related polygons in case we had errors.
